results.title: Tugboat Mickey
results.creator_credit: Clyde Geronimi, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Gang’s All Here”
Tugboat Captain Mickey hears what he thinks is a distress signal from a sinking ship and orders his two man crew to the rescue. Their energetic ineptitude leads from one mishap to another.

results.title: Tuffy the turtle
results.brief_description: Shows physical characteristics of turtles: their shell, head, legs, feet, teeth and eyes, and their reactions to stimuli. Tells a story about a turtle who overcomes ridicule from animal friends after a snail makes him realise how useful a hard shell can be. A language arts teaching film integrating science with a story.

results.title: Tuesday's child
results.brief_description:
Episode number 13 of Series “The American scene”
A dramatisation of the roles of a small girl, her parents and doctors in dealing with the problem of mental retardation in children and what is being done to prepare them for adult life.

results.title: Tudor period
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “English History”
Covering the period of English history from 1485 to 1603, this film treats the growth of the National State under Henry VIII and the rise of England as a leading world power during the reign of Elizabeth. Concludes with the emerging of English culture at the height of the Elizabethan period and its influence in America.

results.title: Tuberculosis: its diagnosis, treatment and control
results.brief_description: Shows the nature, means of transmission, the diagnosis, the treatment of pulmonary tuberculosis. Sunlight and fresh, freely circulating air are the enemies of germs; many city dwellers are, therefore, constantly exposed to the danger of infection with tuberculosis. This film tells the story of Mary Smith, and American high school student who with her aunt is treated successfully.

results.title: Tube and shape binding
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “How to form aluminium”.
Focuses on aluminium bending as an efficient means of fabrication, and describes the most common methods of bending.

results.title: Tuareg
results.brief_description: A six year drought in the Sahel desert has forced the Tuareg to abandon their traditional nomadic ways. The film examines the changes in the structure and lifestyle of the Tuareg and looks at Community Aid Abroad projects which are helping them to establish a new way of life.
results.description: A six year drought in the Sahel desert has forced the Tuareg to abandon their traditional nomadic ways. The film examines the changes in the structure and lifestyle of the Tuareg and looks at Community Aid Abroad projects which are helping them to establish a new way of life.

results.title: Tu Seras Terriblement Gentille = You'll Be Awfully Nice
results.creator_credit: Dirk Sanders, Louis Duchesne and Rene Thevenet
results.brief_description:
Clara and Patrice decide to separate. Filled with ambition, Patrice goes to Paris to work as a photographer. Clara obtains custody of their daughter Julie. Although Clara and Julie remain without news from Patrice for years, the little girl has not lost hope of seeing her parents getting back together. One day, they decide to travel to Paris …

Credits: Producer, Louis Duchesne, Rene Thevenet ; director, Dirk Sanders ; writers, Dirk Sanders, Paul Soreze ; photography, Roger Duculot ; music, Jacques Loussier.
Cast: Frederic de Pasquale, Karen Blanguernon, Leslie Bedos, Jean Moussy, Victor Moussy.
